review_data.content: For me it feels like a duty to try out all places where they serve these little delicious specialities. Probably it was a mistake to go for lunch. It took ages (60min) until we got food, and the dumplings (lunch menu) were ok, but not...More

review_data.title: Staff are nice
review_data.content: staffs are nice but the service are too slow. Dumplings was not amazing but it is same as most Chinese restaurant in Zurich. Still waiting for a real dumplings.

review_data.title: Schrecklich!!!! Teuer und schlechte Service
review_data.content: Erste und das letzte mal was wir kommen! 1 stunde und 30 minuten haben wir gewartet für nur 6 dumplings!...More

review_data.title: Chinese recepies made with local high quality ingredients
review_data.content: We have just been at the opening of this new restaurant and would like to come back again. It offers nice choices of Chinese dumplings, duck, vegitables and sweets. Everything is made with mostly Swiss-grown ingredients, looks nice, tastes good and feels healthy.
